name: Grand Pyro Cards
description:
Complete the Grand Pyro Ritual by playing the correct cards

Follow in the footsteps of your father the "Great Gandolfinius Pyrovici" after his accident in preparation for the Grand Pyro Ritual. 

Every year, Pyro the god of fire, expects a grand spectacle of fireworks. If it pleases him he'll spare mankind, but if the ritual fails....
